thread.title: Top 5 Weekend Getaways In Washington State And Places To Stay
thread.title_full: Top 5 Weekend Getaways In Washington State And Places To Stay

author: admin
title: Top 5 Weekend Getaways In Washington State And Places To Stay
text:
Home > Travel Destinations > Top 5 Weekend Getaways In Washington State And Places To Stay Top 5 Weekend Getaways In Washington State And Places To Stay By admin on August 20, 2015 Pin It 
Washington State provides people with a number of amazing getaways from historic mountain lodges to hotels offering scenic views. You can plan your visit to the Weekend Getaways in Washington to enjoy sea kayaking and whale watching. 
You can also enjoy hiking at these weekend getaways while being surrounded by mountain scenery. You can always use the Weekend Getaways in Washington to have a sight or experience of the charming towns of this state filled with exclusive restaurants, cafes and shops. Top Weekend Getaways In Washington 
Here is the information about best weekend getaways in Washington and about best places to stay in these getaways, where you can enjoy your stay and have fun: Friday Harbor – Roche Harbor Resort 
Friday Harbor is a major commercial area in San Juan Island. Best place to stay in this area is Roche harbor Resort. This resort is set on the magnificent and the beautiful San Juan Island in Washington and it is truly a tranquil and a luxurious retreat. 
This weekend getaway in Washington State offers several luxury accommodations including cozy cottages, boutique sites, village homes and waterfront properties. 
For booking and other information: Roche Harbor Resort Olympic National Park – Kalaloch Lodge 
Olympic National Park is a wonderful place in Washington, which is located in Olympic peninsula. This is perfect weekend getaway for you, if you like to enjoy great coastline, wildlife, natural scenic landscapes. One perfect place to enjoy your stay at Olympic National Park is The Kalaloch Lodge. 
The Kalaloch Lodge overlooks the rocky coastline of the Pacific Northwest. It is a luxurious and a stylish Oceanside retreat offering a tranquil and an exclusive escape. It is located in the midst of the park wilderness providing comfortable accommodations featuring modern amenities. 
For booking and other information: Kalaloch Lodge Orcas Island – Outlook Inn 
Orcas Island is another beautiful island to visit in San Juan Islands. This is largest island of the San Juan Islands. Some of the best places to see in this place are Orcas Island Historical Museum, Lambiel Museum, Historic Camps, etc. Best place to stay and enjoy in Orcas Island is Outlook Inn. 
There are plenty of reasons why people visit Washington which is also called the Evergreen State. The Outlook Inn at San Juan Islands offers stunning sights. It is the only full-service hotel in Washington State providing excellent food and even an on-site chapel. 
For booking and other information: Outlook Inn Snoqualmie Falls – Salish Lodge & Spa 
Snoqualmie Falls is one of the most popular scenic attractions in Washington State. It is located between Snoqualmie and Fall City and attracts many tourists every year. One best place to stay and enjoy the stunning view of this falls is Salish Lodge & Spa. 
This lodge cum spa features rooms in gorgeous settings that overlook the Snoqualmie Falls. This is basically a historic property featuring an elegant spa offering signature treatments. The rooms of this lodge are quite sensuous featuring wood-brining fireplaces. 
For booking and other information: Salish Lodge & Spa Issaquah – TreeHouse Point 
If you love to spend your weekend in wilderness, then Issaquah is the best suitable place for you. Issaquah is just 35 minutes drive from Seattle. When you are in Issaquah, you should visit Issaquah highlands. This place is great for enjoying wilderness, hiking, and outer outdoor activities. 
TreeHouse Point is the best place for staying in Issaquah. It is located in the beautiful forest besides of Ranging River. These charming Tree Houses provided by TreeHouse Point are decorated with handmade beds, and beautiful vintage furniture. 
For booking and other information: TreeHouse Point
